S04bsu029_u:34_16: śamadamanirato viśālabuddhiḥ amṛtarasena ca sarvadā sa tuṣṭaḥ // 79 //
S04bsu029_u:34_17: prativadasi yathā (vasapathā ?) ca bodhimārge sa tu pariśodhayate sadāśayaṃ ca /
S04bsu029_u:34_18: dhāraṇīpratilābhameṣamāṇaḥ sahati ca duḥkha satāṃ guṇābhikāṅkṣī // 80 //
S04bsu029_u:34_20: imu carimabhivīkṣya bodhisattvo yo bhavate 'rthiku śo bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:34_21: ya iha bhavati bodhaye asakto janayati doṣaśatāni so 'lpabuddhiḥ // 81 //
S04bsu029_u:35_1: katame catvāraḥ ? agauravatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ prapātaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:36_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:37_0: nityamagaurava te hi bhavanti āryaguruṣvapi mātṛpitṛṣu /
S04bsu029_u:37_3: kaścidapīha samo mama nāsti vakṣyati śīlaguṇeṣu kathaṃcit // 83 //
S04bsu029_u:37_4: te ca parasparameva ca dviṣṭā chidragaveṣaṇanityaprayuktāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:37_8: bodhipathādapi nitya sudūre āryadhanādapi te ca sudūre /
S04bsu029_u:37_9: mokṣapathaṃ ca vihāya praṇītaṃ pañcasu te gatiṣu bhamiṣyanti // 86 //
S04bsu029_u:38_0: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ bodhiparipanthakārakā dharmāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:38_1: katame catvāraḥ ? aśraddadhānatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ bodhiparipanthakārako dharmaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:38_5: ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ catvāro bodhiparipanthakārakā dharmāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:39_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:40_0: aśraddhāḥ kusīdāḥ sada mūḍhacittā abhimāninaste 'pi sadā ca krodhanā /
S04bsu029_u:40_1: kṣamiṇaśca dṛṣṭvā sada bhikṣu yuktaṃ dāsyanti daṇḍaṃ vrajato vihārāt // 87 //
S04bsu029_u:40_2: parasya pūjārthamiherṣya jātā avasthānu cittasya ca teṣu nāsti /
S04bsu029_u:40_5: dūre itaste mama śāsanasya guṇadveṣiṇaste hi apāyanimnāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:40_6: tyaktvā jinasyāpi ca śāsanaṃ te yāsyantyapāyaṃ jvalitaṃ pracaṇḍam // 89 //
S04bsu029_u:40_7: śrutvā ca teṣāmiha pāpacaryām adharmayuktāṃ ca gatiṃ sudāruṇām /
S04bsu029_u:40_8: yujyadhva nityaṃ sada bodhimārge mā tapsyathā durgatiṣūpapannāḥ // 90 //
S04bsu029_u:40_9: bahukalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:40_10: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyaja pramādaṃ yadi mokṣakāmaḥ // 91 //
S04bsu029_u:41_0: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:41_1: katame catvāraḥ ? pāpamitraṃ rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:41_2: upalambhadṛṣṭiko rāṣṭrapāla pudgalo bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:41_3: saddharmapratikṣepakaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:41_4: āmiṣalolupaḥ pudgalo rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena na sevitavyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:41_5: ime rāṣṭrapāla catvāraḥ pudgalā bodhisattvena na sevitavyāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:42_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:43_0: ye pāpamitrāṇi vivarjayanti kalpāṇamitrāṇi sadā bhajanti /
S04bsu029_u:43_1: vardhanti te bodhipatheṣu nityaṃ yatha śuklapakṣe divi candramaṇḍalam // 92 //
S04bsu029_u:43_2: upalambhadṛṣṭyāṃ ca sadā niviṣṭā ātme niviṣṭāstatha jīvapoṣe /
S04bsu029_u:43_3: viṣakumbhavatte sada varjayanti ye buddhajñānena bhavanti arthikāḥ // 93 //
S04bsu029_u:43_4: kṣipanti ye dharma narottamānāṃ śāntaṃ virāgamamṛtānukūlam /
S04bsu029_u:43_5: tān varjayenmīḍhaghaṭāṃ yathaiva ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 94 //
S04bsu029_u:43_6: adhyoṣitā āmiṣa pātracīvare kulasaṃstave caiva sadābhiyuktāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:43_7: kurvīta sārdhaṃ na hi teṣu saṃstavaṃ tān varjayedagnikhadhāṃ (khadāṃ) yathaiva // 95 //
S04bsu029_u:43_8: yasyepsitaṃ dharṣayituṃ hi māraṃ pravartituṃ cakravaraṃ hyanuttaram /
S04bsu029_u:43_9: sattvārthamevaṃ vipulaṃ ca kartuṃ varjyāśca tenāpi ca pāpamitrāḥ // 96 //
S04bsu029_u:43_10: vivarjayitvā ca priyāpriyāṇi lābhaṃ yaśo bhaṇḍanamānamīrṣyām /
S04bsu029_u:43_11: eṣeta nityaṃ sada buddhajñānaṃ ya icchate budhyitumagrabodhim // 97 //
S04bsu029_u:44_0: catvāra ime rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ duḥkhavipākā dharmāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:44_1: katame catvāraḥ ? jñānenābhimanyanatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvānāṃ duḥkhavipāko dharmaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:45_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:46_0: dharmadharā bhuvi ye tu bhavanti pūjita sarvajageṣu bhavanti /
S04bsu029_u:46_1: avamanyati tāni ājñaḥ (?) tena sa vindati duḥkhamanantam // 98 //
S04bsu029_u:46_2: viṣameṇa sa deśati bhogen chandaruciḥ sada jñāni aśuddhe /
S04bsu029_u:46_3: mānonnata yaśca hi nityaṃ namate guruāryajaneṣu // 99 //
S04bsu029_u:46_4: adhimukti na vidyati buddhe dharmagaṇe ca na tasyadhimuktiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:46_6: sa itaścyuto hi manujeṣu karmavaśādabudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:46_7: narakeṣvatha tiryaggatiṣu pretagatiṣu ca vandati duḥkham / 101 //
S04bsu029_u:46_9: tena apāyapathaṃ pravihāya bodhipathaḥ satataṃ hi niṣevyaḥ // 102 //
S04bsu029_u:47_3: anigṛhītacittasya jñānavirahitasya pramādasevanatā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvasya bandhanam /
S04bsu029_u:48_0: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:49_0: avamanyati nitya parasya bhāvayate sada laukikadhyānam /
S04bsu029_u:49_1: badhyati tebhi sa dṛṣṭiśatebhiḥ paṅki gajo yatha durbalakāyaḥ // 103 //
S04bsu029_u:49_5: so avamanyana manyana tyaktvā yujyati bodhipathe satataṃ ca // 105 //
S04bsu029_u:49_7: tyaktva priyāpriyajñātramaśeṣaṃ buddha bhavanti vikalmaṣa dhīrāḥ // 106 //
S04bsu029_u:49_11: kalpa acintiya pūrva carantaḥ sattvahitāya caran varabodhau /
S04bsu029_u:49_12: dānadame niyame 'pi ca nityaṃ susthita āsi tyajitva ca jñātīn // 108 //
S04bsu029_u:49_13: prāntavane sada nitya rato 'haṃ śoṣita āśrayu bodhinidānam /
S04bsu029_u:49_14: na ca saṃsṛtu vīryaṃ kadācideṣata jñāna mahāpuruṣāṇām // 109 //
S04bsu029_u:49_16: kṛtva kṛpāṃ vipulāmiha pūrve ārjita bodhi balājjagadarthe // 110 //
S04bsu029_u:49_17: duhitṛsvasutāḥ priyabhāryāḥ tyakta purā dhanadhānya prabhūtāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_18: jīvita iṣṭa mahī susamṛddhā eṣata bodhivarāṃ bahukalpān // 111 //
S04bsu029_u:49_19: phalapuṣpajalāḍhya suramya āsi vane muni kṣāntirato 'ham /
S04bsu029_u:49_20: chinna karau caraṇau kalirājñā naiva mano 'pi tadā mama duṣṭam // 112 //
S04bsu029_u:49_21: vanakandari śyāmaku nāma āsi munirbharato gurujīrṇo /
S04bsu029_u:49_24: kāye na ca me na ca jīve bodhinimittamavekṣya babhūva // 114 //
S04bsu029_u:49_28: śoṣitu ratnanidāna samudraḥ prāpya maṇiṃ sukhitāḥ kṛta sattvāḥ // 116 //
S04bsu029_u:49_31: duḥkhita vīkṣya naraṃ ca daridraṃ tyakta mayā priyameva śarīram /
S04bsu029_u:49_32: prāpya dhanaṃ sa kṛtaśca mayāḍhyaḥ sarvadadena nṛpeṇa satā me // 118 //
S04bsu029_u:49_33: śaraṇāgata vīkṣya kapotaṃ svaṃ piśitaṃ vinikṛtya śarīrāt /
S04bsu029_u:49_34: dattamapi svatanurna bhayārtastyakta ihāpi nṛpeṇa satā me // 119 //
S04bsu029_u:49_36: jīvita tyajya parasya dadau taṃ kesarirāja babhūva yadāham // 120 //
S04bsu029_u:49_38: caratā ca purā jagadarthe madri pativrata tyakta saputrā /
S04bsu029_u:49_41: uttaptavīryu yada āsīt arthadhanaśriyo 'pi ca purā me // 122 //
S04bsu029_u:49_43: pūjā kṛtā daśabalānām āsi nṛpātmaji vimalatejāḥ // 123 //
S04bsu029_u:49_44: raudrākṣa eva ca ruṣitvā yācitavān sa cāpi mama śīrṣam /
S04bsu029_u:49_45: dattaṃ nikṛtya ca mayā tad rāja yadā ca candraprabha āsīt // 124 //
S04bsu029_u:49_47: sattvārtha sthāpit mayā te puṇyasamo babhūva ca yadāham // 125 //
S04bsu029_u:49_49: tyaktāṃ pūrvabhaveṣu caratā me āsi yadā śubho nṛpati pūrve // 126 //
S04bsu029_u:49_51: tyaktaśca me makuṭa pūrva āsi nṛpo yadā ratanacūḍaḥ // 127 //
S04bsu029_u:49_53: tyaktau karau sacaraṇau me pūrva nṛpeṇa dhṛtimatā ca // 128 //
S04bsu029_u:49_55: kṛta mānuṣā badaradvīpe siṃhala sārthavāha yada āsīt // 129 //
S04bsu029_u:49_56: kāmeṣu mṛrcchitamanā me bāli sa rākṣasī pramadasaṃjñā /
S04bsu029_u:49_57: pañcaśatāni vaṇijānāṃ mokṣita te yadā bhave sunetraḥ // 130 //
S04bsu029_u:49_59: pravrajya nirgatu jinasya śāsane puṇyaraśmi yada āsīt // 131 //
S04bsu029_u:49_60: mayi tyaktamaṅguli udārā sattvahitārthameva caratā me /
S04bsu029_u:49_61: jālārcitā vimalaśuddhā kāñcanavarṇa pārthiva yada āsīt // 132 //
S04bsu029_u:49_63: tyaktā mayā ca jagadarthe utpalanetre pārthiva yadāsīt // 133 //
S04bsu029_u:49_65: parimocitā karuṇayā me keśava vaidyarāja yada āsīt // 134 //
S04bsu029_u:49_66: vyādhyāturaṃ ca naramīkṣya svaṃ rudhiraṃ pradattamapi me 'bhūt /
S04bsu029_u:49_67: nirvyādhitaḥ sa ca kṛto me prāgbhava sarvadarśi yadabhūvam // 135 //
S04bsu029_u:49_69: hitvā svamasthi ca śarīrād vyādhikṛśasya majja mayā dattam /
S04bsu029_u:49_70: na ca sattva tyakta maya jātu āsi nṛpo yadā kusuma nāma // 136 //
S04bsu029_u:49_71: sarvasvakośamapi tyaktva jīvita tyakta me priya manāpam /
S04bsu029_u:49_72: naru mokṣito vyasanaprāpta āsi nṛpo 'rthasiddhi yada pūrvam // 137 //
S04bsu029_u:49_74: nṛpa āśuketu yada āsīd bodhimabhīpsamāna jagadarthe // 138 //
S04bsu029_u:49_75: nṛpa sarvadarśi yada āsīt kāruṇiko janārthahitakāmaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_76: tyaktā mayā caturo 'pi ca dvīpāḥ sphītanarairvranarīśataiśca // 139 //
S04bsu029_u:49_77: mṛdu komalaṃ vikalagauraṃ ūru tacchittva hṝṣṭamuditāyā /
S04bsu029_u:49_78: dattaṃ svamāṃsa rudhiraṃ me jñānavatī yadāsi nṛpaputrī // 140 //
S04bsu029_u:49_80: strī prekṣya me kṣudhatṛṣārtaṃ sā rūpya (pa ?) vatīti vanitā yadābhūt // 141 //
S04bsu029_u:49_83: rājñaḥ suto tu vikṛtajñaḥ tārita sāgarādyada kṛtajñaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_84: ratnārtha netra mama tena uddhṛta naiva me ruṣita cittam // 143 //
S04bsu029_u:49_85: mā bhūtpipīlikavadho me tyakta varāśrayo 'pi canapekṣya /
S04bsu029_u:49_86: na ca citta kampita tadā me tyakta pūrvabhaveṣu godha yada āsīt // 144 //
S04bsu029_u:49_88: na ca mānavānapi ca stabdha āsi kapiṃjalo vicaramāṇaḥ // 145 //
S04bsu029_u:49_89: śaraṇāgatasya ca mayārthe tyakta samucchrayaḥ kṛpa janitvā /
S04bsu029_u:49_90: na ca tyakta vānaragatena vyādhanaraḥ śarābhinihatena // 146 //
S04bsu029_u:49_91: gajavaśagatena śoṣito me tanurapi vṛddhaguruṃ jagatsmaritvā /
S04bsu029_u:49_92: suruciramaśanaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ mokṣita ātma gajā yadā tadāsīt // 147 //
S04bsu029_u:49_93: ṛkṣapatirabhūva śailadurge himahata sapta dināni rakṣito me /
S04bsu029_u:49_94: puruṣa vadhaku tena me prayukto na ca pratighāta kṛtaśca me tadāsmin // 148 //
S04bsu029_u:49_96: sa viṣeṇa śareṇa ca viddho daṃṣṭravarāṃstyajamāna na dviṣṭaḥ // 149 //
S04bsu029_u:49_100: / 150 // gaṅgataraṅgajalairhiyamāṇaḥ tārita me yada āsi mṛgatve /
S04bsu029_u:49_101: vadhakā mama tenapanītā naiva mano mama tatra praduṣṭam // 151 //
S04bsu029_u:49_103: taiśca hataḥ kṣudhitaiśca tadāhaṃ kacchapayonigato 'pi ca maitraḥ // 152 //
S04bsu029_u:49_104: bodhicariṃ caramāṇahu pūrvaṃ matsya babhūva yadā jalacarī /
S04bsu029_u:49_107: sattva kṛtāḥ sukhitā nirujāśca prāṇaku saumya tadā ca yadāsīt // 154 //
S04bsu029_u:49_108: siṃha babhūva yadā mṛgarājā sthāmabalānvita kāruṇikaśca /
S04bsu029_u:49_109: viddha śareṇa na dūṣita cittaṃ maitri tadā vadhake 'pi tadā me // 155 //
S04bsu029_u:49_110: śaṅkhatuṣāranibho hayarājā āsi purā ca samudrataṭe 'ham /
S04bsu029_u:49_111: rākṣasimadhyagatā vaṇijo me tārita kṛtva kṛpāṃ karuṇāṃ ca // 156 //
S04bsu029_u:49_112: bodhicariṃ caramāṇa janārthe āsi kuṇāla ahaṃ yada pakṣī /
S04bsu029_u:49_113: varjita kāmaguṇā bahudoṣā no ca vaśaṃ pramadāna gato 'ham // 157 //
S04bsu029_u:49_114: āsi śaśo vanagulmanivāsī śāsatī taṃ sukṛte śaśavargam /
S04bsu029_u:49_116: āsi śuko drumapuṣpaphalāḍhyo śuṣkadrumo na ca me sa hi tyaktaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_117: dṛṣṭa kṛtajña tadā mama śakrastaṃ kṛtavāṃstaru patraphalāḍhyam // 159 //
S04bsu029_u:49_119: rājabhayāttu vimokṣita te me vānararāja ahaṃ yada āsīt // 160 //
S04bsu029_u:49_120: śuka bhūta purā guruhetoḥ śāli haraṃśca nareṇa gṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_121: kiṃ nu śukā harase mama śāli nāśayate 'pi ca pakṣi maśasyam ( matsasyam) // 161 //
S04bsu029_u:49_122: śuka so 'bravīdbhadra śṛṇuṣva caurya harāmi na te ahu śālim /
S04bsu029_u:49_123: jīrṇagurudvayapoṣaṇahetoḥ śāli harāmi kṛpārtha tu teṣām // 162 //
S04bsu029_u:49_125: bīja prakīrṇa yadā prathamaṃ te bhāga dadāmi sarvajanasya /
S04bsu029_u:49_126: tacca giraṃ vadato mama śrutvā tenāpi caurya bhavenna kadācit // 163 //
S04bsu029_u:49_127: sādhu śukā hara śāli yatheṣṭaṃ durlabha mānuṣa yasyimu bhaktiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_128: mānuṣa tvaṃ maya tīryagatehā sādhu damaḥ śama saṃyama tubhyam // 164 //
S04bsu029_u:49_129: ityevamāni caritāni pūrva caranta duṣkara kṛtāni /
S04bsu029_u:49_130: na ca me manasi tatra bhavi kheda eṣata uttamāṃ viraja bodhim // 165 //
S04bsu029_u:49_131: ādhyātmikaṃ hyatha ca bāhyaṃ nāsti hi vastu yanmayā na dattam /
S04bsu029_u:49_132: śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya dhyāna upāya prajña carito 'ham // 166 //
S04bsu029_u:49_133: māṃsaṃ tvacaṃ tathapi ca majja śoṇitameva datta svaśarīrāt /
S04bsu029_u:49_134: prānte guhāsu ca yadā me śoṣita āśrayo 'pi caratā me // 167 //
S04bsu029_u:49_135: dhutayāna deśita jinebhiḥ yatra prayujyato jina bhavanti /
S04bsu029_u:49_136: tatra dhute satataṃ ca prayukto āsi caranta pure ahu nityam // 168 //
S04bsu029_u:49_137: etādṛśā vrata udārā ye ca niṣevitā caratā me /
S04bsu029_u:49_138: śrutvā ca teṣamimāścaryamekapade na bhaviṣyati chandaḥ // 169 //
S04bsu029_u:49_139: hāsyu bhaviṣyati ima śruṇitvā śāsanametadeva ca taḍānīm /
S04bsu029_u:49_142: śrutvā ca dharmamima śāntaṃ naiṣa jinokta ityabhivadanti // 171 //
S04bsu029_u:49_143: ācāryo me śrutasamudro āsi bahuśrutaḥ kathikaśreṣṭhaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_144: tenāpi caiṣa pratiṣiddho buddhavaco hi naiṣa tu kathaṃcit // 172 //
S04bsu029_u:49_145: parato 'pyabhūdapi ca vṛddhaḥ tasya guruḥ sa śāmitaguṇaughaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:49_146: tenāpi naiṣa hi gṛhīto mātra prayujyatha vitathametat // 173 //
S04bsu029_u:49_147: yatrātma nāsti na ca jīvo deśita pudgalo 'pi na kathaṃcit /
S04bsu029_u:49_148: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra ghaṭate yaḥ śīlaprayoga saṃvarakriyā ca // 174 //
S04bsu029_u:49_149: yadyasti caiva mahāyānaṃ nātra hi ātma sattva manujo vā /
S04bsu029_u:49_150: vyarthaḥ śramo 'tra hi kṛto me yatra na cātmasattvaupalabdhiḥ // 175 //
S04bsu029_u:49_152: bhāṣeta no jina kadācit vācamimāṃ hi bhikṣuparibhāṣām // 176 //

S04bsu029_u:61_3: jñātisaṃghena koṭiḥ, naigamajñānapadaiḥ koṭiḥ, sarvarājena koṭiḥ kanyānāṃ dattā abhūvan /
S04bsu029_u:61_4_0: tāśca sarvā abhurūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ sarvāḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣapramāṇā jātyā gītakuśalā vādyakuśalā nṛttakuśalā hasitakuśalāḥ
S04bsu029_u:61_4_1: puruṣopasaṃkramaṇakuśalā ārjavāḥ śiśavā madhurā vṛddhayaḥ pūrvābhilāpinyaḥ smitamukhāśopacārakuśalāḥ sarvakalāsu vidhijñā
S04bsu029_u:61_7_0: vyaktāṃ iva devakanyakāḥ, ekāntamanāmayacāroṇyaḥ / tāsāṃ madhyagataḥ puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ saṃgītisaṃprabhāṇitena tatra
S04bsu029_u:61_7_1: ca saṃgītiśabde caivaṃ cittamutpādayati - mahānamitrasaṃgho batāyaṃ mama prādurbhutaḥ kuśaladharmaparimoṣakaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:61_8: hanta anapekṣo bhaviṣyāmi / sa tasmin samaye syādyathāpi nāma vadhyaḥ puruṣo dṛṣṭvā na vismayacitta mutpādayati,
S04bsu029_u:61_9: evameva puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ tāṃ pramadāṃ dṛṣṭvā na viṣmayati,
S04bsu029_u:61_10: nāpi tatra nagare, na ca sakhībhiṃrvismayati sma /
S04bsu029_u:61_12: na śabdanimittaṃ na gandha nimittaṃ na rasanimittaṃ na sparśanimittamudgṛhītavān /
S04bsu029_u:61_13_0: anyatraivaṃrūpaṃ cittaṃ pravartayate sma - kadā tāvadevaṃrūpādamitrasaṃghamadhyānmama mokṣo bhaviṣyati ? kadāhamapramādacaryāṃ
S04bsu029_u:61_13_1: cariṣyāmi yena me mokṣo bhaviṣyati ? atha khalu tāḥ kanyakāḥ rājño 'rciṣmata ārocayanti sma - na deva kumāraḥ krīḍati,
S04bsu029_u:61_14: na ramate, na paricārayati ? atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājā arciṣmānaśītibhī rājasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu029_u:61_15: upasaṃkramyāśrumukhaḥ pravepamānena kāyena śocamāno dharaṇitale prapatitaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_0: prakṣasva putravararatna mama pralāpaṃ śokārdito nipatito 'smi bhuvi kṣapānte /
S04bsu029_u:62_1: kenāpriyaṃ tava kṛtaṃ mam tadbravīhi jyeṣṭhaṃ dadāmi yadihāsya kṣaṇena daṇḍam // 244 //
S04bsu029_u:62_3: prekṣasva me 'dya nagaraṃ surasaṃgharamyaṃ manasā mayābhiracittaṃ yadidaṃ tvadarthe /
S04bsu029_u:62_4: kimihāṅgamadya vikalaṃ mama tadvadāśu śakrasya vādya vibhavaṃ tava darśayāmi // 245 //
S04bsu029_u:62_6: etābhiranyaiśca ramasva vinīya śokaṃ kiṃ śalyaviddha iva dhyāyasi dīnavakraḥ // 246 //
S04bsu029_u:62_7: etāḥ svaraṅgarucirāḥ suratervidhijñāḥ saṃgītitālasamaye ca viniścayajñāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_8: kālastavādya suratasya na śocitasya mlānaṃ saroruhamivāsi kimadya dīnaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_10: saṃcintayasva prathamaṃ hi vayastavedaṃ kālo rate rama ihādya suta prasīda // 248 //
S04bsu029_u:62_12: padmāni mattavaraṣaṭpadabhūṣitāni saṃcintya tāṃ ka iha nābhirameta putra // 249 //
S04bsu029_u:62_14: gandharvamādana ivā himavatsamīpe śrutvā naraḥ ka iha nātra ratiṃ labheta // 250 //
S04bsu029_u:62_16: ratnāsanāni ca varāṇi varāstṛtāni cārusvarā kanakakaṅkaṇatālapaṅktyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_18: kanyāḥ sahasrabahugītarutāḥ kriyante śrūyanti nandanavane 'psarasāṃ yathaiva /
S04bsu029_u:62_20: kasmān triviṣṭapasame bhavane manojñe vikṣiptacitta iha kiṃ na ratiṃ karoṣi //
S04bsu029_u:62_22: ete kumāra tava devasamānagarbhāḥ krīḍāsakhāya saha putra ramasva caibhiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_23: mātā pitā ca tava saṃsthita sāśrukaṇṭhāḥ kiṃ duḥkha nāsti karuṇā ca jane tavāsmin // 253 //
S04bsu029_u:62_25: saṃsārapañcaragataṃ jagadīkṣyaṃ cedaṃ mokṣārthikaḥ pitaramāha śṛṇuṣva deva // 254 //
S04bsu029_u:62_26: devāpriyaṃ mam kṛtaṃ na hi kenacinme kiṃ tvasti me 'dya na hi kāmaguṇeṣu chandaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_27: sarve priyāṃ ripusamā hi nirānuraktā ye kleśadurgatiprapāta prapātayanti //
S04bsu029_u:62_29: etāḥ striyo hyabudhabālajanābhirāmā mārasya pāśaguṇabaddha mahāprapātāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_30: nityaṃ tathā vigarhita āryajanena caitāḥ sevāmi kiṃ narakadurgatiśokamūlāḥ //
S04bsu029_u:62_32: etāḥ striyo hi chavimātrakarūparabhyāḥ snāyvasthiyantramaśucībhi nirarthako 'ham /
S04bsu029_u:62_33: prasrāviṇī rudhiramūtraśakṛnmalānāṃ vyaktaṃ śmaśānasadṛśīṣu kathaṃ rameyam // 257 //
S04bsu029_u:62_34: gītaṃ na śroṣyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ svapnāya mābhiratayo 'budhamohanāśca /
S04bsu029_u:62_35: saṃkalpalālasa gatā abudhā tu nāśaṃ kiṃ kleśadāsa iva bālajano bhaviṣye // 258 //
S04bsu029_u:62_36: sarve ime drumalatā śiśire pravṛtte kāntāravṛkṣasadṛśā hi bhavantyaramyāḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_37: sarvaśriyo vidhamanī hi anityateyaṃ mohātpramādamupayāmi cale tu jīve // 259 //
S04bsu029_u:62_38: cittaṃ samudra iva tarpayituṃ na śakyaṃ tṛṣṇāpravṛttinirataḥ punareva kāṅkṣa /
S04bsu029_u:62_40: anyonyaghāti jagadīkṣya hi kāmahetoḥ meruryathaiva pavanairahamaprampyaḥ // 260 //
S04bsu029_u:62_41: na tvaṃ pitā na sahajā mama nāpi bhāryāḥ trātā na bāndhavajanā nṛpate hmapāyāt /
S04bsu029_u:62_42: sarve vayaṃ tṛṇagatā iva bindulekhā mā tāta cittavaśagā bhavatāṃ pramattāḥ // 261 //
S04bsu029_u:62_43: dhigyauvanena manujeśvara yanna nityaṃ dhigjīvitasya gamanaṃ giritoyaśīghram /
S04bsu029_u:62_44: dhiksaṃskṛtaṃ kṣayamidaṃ taḍidabhralolaṃ dhikkaṇḍitasya tribhave nṛpa kāmarāgaḥ // 262 //
S04bsu029_u:62_45: saṃcodito 'smi vibudhairbhava apramatto no bodhisattva bhavate viṣayābhilagnaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_46: buddho bhaveyamiha lokahitānukampī nāsti pramādacaritasya narendra bodhiḥ // 263 //
S04bsu029_u:62_47: kāmāturo bhavati yo nṛpa cittadāsaḥ sa hi puṇyanāśanirato vinivṛttasvargaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_48: hiṃsāsamiddhamapi nābhicareta jātu pakṣīva pañjaragataḥ kathamāśvaseta // 264 //
S04bsu029_u:62_49: dhātūśca sarpasadṛśā vadhakāśca skandhāḥ cittaṃ ca sāsravamanarthaka śūnya grāmaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_50: viṣastambapuṣpita iveha narendra kāyaḥ oghe 'tiruhyati kathaṃ nu ratirmamātra // 265 //
S04bsu029_u:62_51: saṃprekṣase jagadidaṃ kugatiprapannaṃ vyaktaṃ padaṃ gaganatulyamapi jvalantam /
S04bsu029_u:62_52: teṣāṃ pramokṣaṇanimittamihādya rājan śivadharmanāva samudānayitāsmi śīghram // 266 //
S04bsu029_u:62_53: suptān vibodhayitumātura jīvitārthaṃ śalya nimūlayitumutpathagān vinetum /
S04bsu029_u:62_54: prod ghuṣya bandhanabimokṣa mahāsahasre saṃtarpayaṃściradaridra subhāṣitena // 267 //
S04bsu029_u:62_55: sīdanta durgatipathādapi coddhariṣye andhe cakṣurapi tṛṣṇalatāviśoṣī /
S04bsu029_u:62_60: etatsmarannahamiha kṣitiśopaviṣṭo nāstīha me praṇidhi saṃskṛtasarvakāmaiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:62_61: bodhyarthiko hi vicarāmiha sattvahetoḥ ekāṃśiko na hi bhavābhiratau mamecchā // 270 //
S04bsu029_u:62_62: jānan vasetka iha pārthiva śatrumadhye ko buddhimān sabhayamārgapathaṃ vrajeta /
S04bsu029_u:62_63: ko vā sacakṣuriha tāta patetprapāte ko bodhimārgamadhigamya bhavetpramattaḥ // 271 //
S04bsu029_u:62_64: anusrota sarvajagatī pratisrotā so 'haṃ vācā na śakyamiha pārthiva bodhi prāptum /
S04bsu029_u:62_65: meruprayātamapi sāgaramutsaheyaṃ na tveva me mana ihābhirameta kāmaiḥ // 272 //
S04bsu029_u:62_66: gacchāśu pārthiva varasvajanena sārdhaṃ sarvāṃ hi rāṣṭraratimutsṛja sarvaloke /
S04bsu029_u:62_67: ādāya gacchatu yathābhimataṃ hi yasya gṛhyāpramāda mama tāta na rājyakoṭyā // 273 //
S04bsu029_u:62_68: śakyā na nārigaṇamadhyagatena bodhiḥ prāptuṃ śivaṃ padamanuttarayogakṣemam /
S04bsu029_u:62_69: gacchāmyahaṃ girivanāntaramāśrayāmi prāptā hyaraṇyaniratena jinena bodhiḥ // 274 //
S04bsu029_u:63_0: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ prāsādatalagata eva tābhiḥ pramadābhiḥ sārdhaṃ caṃkramannudvignamanāḥ saṃstribhirīryāpathairviharati /
S04bsu029_u:63_3: so 'rdharātrakālasamaye aśroṣīt - antarīkṣācchuddhāvāsakāyikā devatā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇā gacchanti,
S04bsu029_u:63_4: vistareṇa dharmasya saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇā gacchanti /
S04bsu029_u:63_5: śrutvā ca rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ aśru nipātayati /
S04bsu029_u:63_6: sa saṃvegajāto 'ñjaliṃ kṛtvā tāṃ devatāṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:64_1: mayi karuṇa janitvā devatā duḥkhite 'smin yadi na kuruta manyuṃ kiṃcidevābhipṛcche /
S04bsu029_u:64_2: kasya guṇa vadanto gacchetātrāntarīkṣe sukhitamiha mano me vākyametaṃ niśāmya /
S04bsu029_u:65_0: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla tā devatāḥ puṇyaraśmirājakumāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -
S04bsu029_u:66_0: śravaṇamupagataste kiṃ na buddhaḥ kumāra śaraṇamaśaraṇānāṃ nāma siddhārthabuddhiḥ /
S04bsu029_u:68_0: ahamapi jina dṛkṣye kīdṛśaṃ tasya rūpaṃ vadata api ca sarve kīdṛśo cāsya varṇaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:68_1: ahamapi paripṛcche kīdṛśī bodhicaryā bhavati yatha caran vai sarvasattvaikanāthaḥ // 277 //
S04bsu029_u:69_0: atha khalu tā devatāḥ puṇyaraśmiṃ rājakumāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -
S04bsu029_u:70_0: snugdharucikeśā dakṣiṇāvartajātā giritatamiva haima śobhate cāsya coṣṇi /
S04bsu029_u:70_1: gagana iva ca śūnyo bhāsate cāsya ūrṇā sphaṭikamaṇiviśuddhā dakṣiṇā nābhi jātā // 278 //
S04bsu029_u:70_2: bhramaragaṇaviśuddhā netra nīlotpalābhā siṃhahanu narendrao bimba oṣṭhaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ /
S04bsu029_u:70_3: sṛjati ca sahasraṃ vai raśmikoṭīranantān sphurati ca trisahasrān durgatīḥ śoṣayaṃśca // 279 //
S04bsu029_u:70_4: samasahitasuvṛttā danta citra suśuklā himarajataviśuddhā viṃśati dveguṇāsya /
S04bsu029_u:70_5: jinavarapravarasya tasya daṃṣṭrāścatasraḥ svakamukhapraticchādā tasya jihvā prabhūtā // 280 //
S04bsu029_u:70_6: giri varasahitārthā tasya pralhādanīyā sahita akuṭilā ca bramhaghoṣā suyuktā /
S04bsu029_u:70_9: avikalaguṇacitrā bodhi aṅgānukūlā hāraśatasahasrā gumphitā dharmamālā /
S04bsu029_u:70_10: tūryarativighuṣṭā devatāgītaramyā amararucisvarā vai hlādanī vāgjinasya // 282 //
S04bsu029_u:70_13: citrasphaṭikaślakṣṇā paṇḍitānāṃ manāpā codanī vinayanīyā bodhanī premaṇīyā /
S04bsu029_u:70_14: paracarimanakūlā toṣaṇī pṛcchamānā imaguṇa vacanā caitasya dharmeśvarasya // 284 //
S04bsu029_u:70_15: kamburucira grīvā śāntasaṃvṛttaskandhaḥ / dīrghaparigha bāhū tasya saptotsadāṅgam /
S04bsu029_u:70_16: kara rucirasuvṛttā dirghavṛttāṅgulīkāḥ tapitakanakavarṇaṃ tasya gātraṃ jinasya // 285 //
S04bsu029_u:70_17: roma pariṇatāśca dakṣiṇo caikajātā nābhi nikhila durgā guhyakośo hayo vā /
S04bsu029_u:70_18: ūru gajakaro vā eṇajaṅghaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ karatala suvicitrā svastikāścakracitrāḥ // 286 //
S04bsu029_u:70_20: gaganakusumavṛṣṭiḥ puṣpachatrā bhavanti vrajatimanuvrajanti dharma ete 'dbhutasya // 287 //
S04bsu029_u:70_21: lābha atha alābhe saukhyaduḥkhe jinasya ayaśasi yaśa evaṃ nindaśaṃsāsu caivam /
S04bsu029_u:70_22: jalaruhamiva toyaiḥ sarvato nopaliptaḥ evamiha nṛsiṃho nāsti sattvaḥ samo 'sya // 288 //
S04bsu029_u:71_0: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ buddhasya varṇaṃ śrutvā,
S04bsu029_u:71_3: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṣparaśme rājakumārasyaitadabhavat - yādṛśaḥ saṃbudho bhagavān,
S04bsu029_u:71_4: yādṛśī cāsya saṃghasaṃpat, yādṛśaśca tena dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ,
S04bsu029_u:71_9: yathā bahudoṣāśca kāmāḥ, yathā garhitaśca paṇḍitaiḥ pramādaḥ,
S04bsu029_u:71_12: yathā durdamaṃ citram, yathā gambhīraṃ nāmarūpam, yathānāsvādaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam, yathā duḥkhavipākaścāparijñātaḥ sparśaḥ,
S04bsu029_u:71_13: yathā bahvādīnavā vedanāḥ, yathā gāḍhabandhanā tṛṣṇā, yathā duḥpratiniḥsaraṇaṃ copādānam,
S04bsu029_u:71_14: yathānāryā bhavatṛṣṇā, bhave sati yathā duḥkhasamucchedyā ca jātiḥ,
S04bsu029_u:71_15: yathā vikārakarī ca jarā, yathā vilopakārakaśca vyādhiḥ,
S04bsu029_u:71_17: yathālpāsvādā ca pravṛttiḥ, yathā bahvādīnavā ca bhavābhinirvṛttiḥ,
S04bsu029_u:71_19_0: nedaṃ śakyaṃ kāmadāsena kleśasaṃmohitena cittakhilena pramādābhiratena bālamadhyagatenāyoniśaścittena saṃsāraraktacittena
S04bsu029_u:71_19_1: durjanamadhyagatena na śakyaṃ sugatipanthānamapi viśodhayituṃ kutaḥ punaranuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S04bsu029_u:71_21: mā me dvāreṇa niṣkramato jñātisaṃgho 'ntarāyaṃ kuryāt /
S04bsu029_u:72_0: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro yena bhagavān siddhārthabuddhisthathāgatastanmukhastataḥ prāsādādātmānamutsṛṣṭavān,
S04bsu029_u:72_1: evaṃ ca bhāṣate sma - sacetsa tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ jānāti sarvaṃ paśyati,
S04bsu029_u:72_3: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla siddhārthabuddhistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ prasārya prabhāṃ prāmuñcat,
S04bsu029_u:72_5: tasyāśca prabhāyāḥ śatasahasrapatraṃ padmaṃ śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātraṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu029_u:72_8: aht khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastasmin padme sthitvā yena sa bhagavān siddhārdhabuddhistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu029_u:73_0: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla tena siddhārthabuddhinā tathāgatena sā prabhā pratisaṃhṛtā /
S04bsu029_u:73_1: sa ca kumārastasya bhagavataḥ pādamūle chinnāpādapa iva prapatitaḥ śatasahasrakṛtvastathāgataṃ vandate sma /
S04bsu029_u:74_0: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu029_u:75_0: mayā cirādadya hi vaidyarājaḥ kṛcchrādavāpto 'dya cirātureṇa /
S04bsu029_u:75_1: ācakṣva me nātha kathaṃ sthito 'haṃ lābhī bhaveyaṃ sugatasya śāsane // 289 //
S04bsu029_u:75_2: śruto mayā nāyaka apramādo niśāmya rātrau divi devatābhyaḥ /
S04bsu029_u:75_3: śrutvā ca saṃvigna hi āgato 'haṃ kathaṃ narāṇāṃ bhavate pramādaḥ // 290 //
S04bsu029_u:75_4: pranaṣṭamārgasya bhavādya deśiko jātyandhabhūtasya bhavādya cakṣuḥ /
S04bsu029_u:75_5: mahāprapātādiha māṃ samuddhara śraddhākarā kāruṇikā cikitsakā // 291 //
S04bsu029_u:75_6: daridrabhūtasya kuruṣva saṃgrahaṃ baddhasya mokṣaṃ kuru me 'dya nātha /
S04bsu029_u:75_7: sasaṃśayebhyo vimatiṃ ca chinda caryāṃ ca me vyākuru bodhimārge // 292 //
S04bsu029_u:75_9: tīrthaṃ ca saṃdarśaya uhyato me dīpaṃ kuruṣvāpi mamāndhakāre /
S04bsu029_u:75_10: vraṇīkṛtaṃ māṃ hi kuruṣva nirvraṇaṃ śalyaṃ ca me uddhara vaidyarāja // 293 //
S04bsu029_u:75_13: parīttamāyuḥ kṣayadharmi jīvitaṃ bahvantarāyaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavatyapi /

S04bsu029_u:89_19: ye yuktāśca ihāpi harṣitā jinayāne śrutvā yukta sudurmanā bhavitāraḥ /
S04bsu029_u:89_20: tasmādvai janayeta śāsane adhimuktiṃ mā paścādanutāpa bheṣyathā vicaramāṇāḥ // 353 //
S04bsu029_u:90_0: yaśca punā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvaḥ pañcapāramitāsu caret,
S04bsu029_u:90_1: yaśceha dharmaparyāyapratipatyā saṃpādayet - ahamatra śikṣiṣye 'hamatra saṃvare sthāsyāmi /
S04bsu029_u:90_2: eṣa puṇyaskandho 'sya puṇyaskandhasya purataḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamāmapi śatasahasratamāmapi koṭiśatasahasratamāmapi,
S04bsu029_u:90_3: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi dhṛtipadamapi nopaiti /
S04bsu029_u:90_4: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāsyamāṇe triṃśatāṃ niyutānāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāśca prajāyā anutpadantapūrvāṇyanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni /
S04bsu029_u:91_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālo bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S04bsu029_u:91_1: kathaṃ cainaḥ dhārayāmi ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ rāṣṭrapālametadavocat - amoghapratijñāviśuddhamiti nāma dhāraya /
S04bsu029_u:92_0: idamavocadbhagavān / āttamanā āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
